channel.title: Devo V7 + Packet Handler
channel.description:
Devo V7 With Packet Handler.
I Do [u]NOT[/u] Suggest this to people with 0 experience with Packets and PacketHandling. This source contains 2 Handled packets, Yes ONLY 2. The rest is up to you. This means,
[ol][li]No Walking,[/li] [li]No Talking,[/li] [li]Nothing! [/li][/ol] The only two handled packets are, Commands (case 103) and Idle Logout (case 202).
[IMG]http://img75.imageshack.us/img75/9958/packetsor0.png[/img]
Here are the Two handled packets. [IMG]http://img257.imageshack.us/img257/8862/twohandledpacketsoc1.png[/img]
I'm sure you'll work out how to handle packets, Good luck.
http://files.filefront.com/Devolution+v7rar/;12841509;/fileinfo.html

@x_blitz_x wrote:

Devo V7 With Packet Handler.

I Do NOT Suggest this to people with 0 experience with Packets and PacketHandling. This source contains 2 Handled packets, Yes ONLY 2. The rest is up to you. This means,

[ol][li]No Walking,[/li]
[li]No Talking,[/li]
[li]Nothing!
[/li][/ol]
The only two handled packets are, Commands (case 103) and Idle Logout (case 202).

Here are the Two handled packets.
